/home/HYZ930402/Zmq/trimmomatic/Trimmomatic-0.38/trimmomatic-0.38.jar PE -phred33 017_R1.fastq 017_R2.fastq output_forward_paired.fq.gz output_forward_unpaired.fq.gz output_reverse_paired.fq.gz output_reverse_unpaired.fq.gz ILLUMINACLIP:TruSeq3-PE.fa:2:30:10 LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:15 MINLEN:36 java -jar trimmomatic-0.35.jar PE -phred33 input_forward.fq.gz input_reverse.fq.gz output_forward_paired.fq.gz output_forward_unpaired.fq.gz output_reverse_paired.fq.gz output_reverse_unpaired.fq.gz ILLUMINACLIP:TruSeq3-PE.fa:2:30:10 LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:15 MINLEN:36 This will perform the following:
ILLUMINACLIP:TruSeq3-PE.fa:2:30:10 ILLUMINACLIPï¼Œæ¥å¤´åºåˆ—åˆ‡é™¤å‚æ•°ã€‚LLUMINACLIP:TruSeq3-PE.fa:2:30:10ï¼ˆçœæ‰äº†è·¯å¾„ï¼‰æ„æ€åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ï¼šTruSeq3-PE.faæ˜¯æ¥å¤´åºåˆ—ï¼Œ2æ˜¯æ¯”å¯¹æ—¶æ¥å¤´åºåˆ—æ—¶æ‰€å…è®¸çš„æœ€å¤§é”™é…æ•°ï¼›30æŒ‡çš„æ˜¯è¦æ±‚PEçš„ä¸¤æ¡readåŒæ—¶å’ŒPEçš„adapteråºåˆ—æ¯”å¯¹ï¼ŒåŒ¹é…åº¦åŠ èµ·æ¥è¶…30%ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±è®¤ä¸ºè¿™å¯¹PEçš„readå«æœ‰adapterï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨å¯¹åº”çš„ä½ç½®éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œåˆ‡é™¤ã€‚ã€æ³¨ã€‘10å’Œå‰é¢çš„30ä¸åŒï¼Œå®ƒæŒ‡çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œæˆ‘å°±ä»€ä¹ˆä¹Ÿä¸ç®¡ï¼Œåæ­£åªè¦è¿™æ¡readçš„æŸéƒ¨åˆ†å’Œadpateråºåˆ—æœ‰è¶…è¿‡10%çš„åŒ¹é…ç‡ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±ä»£è¡¨å«æœ‰adapteräº†ï¼Œéœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œå»é™¤ LEADING:3 å»æ‰å¼€å¤´è´¨é‡ä½äº3æˆ–Nç¢±åŸº TRAILING:3 å»æ‰æœ«å°¾è´¨é‡ä½äº3æˆ–Nç¢±åŸº SLIDINGWINDOW:4:15 ä»¥4ä¸ªç¢±åŸºä¸ºæ»‘åŠ¨çª—å£å¯¹readsè¿›è¡Œæ‰«æï¼Œå½“å¹³å‡è´¨é‡å€¼ä½äº15æ—¶è¿›è¡Œå‰ªåˆ‡ MINLEN:36 è§„å®šreadè¢«åˆ‡é™¤åè‡³å°‘éœ€è¦ä¿ç•™çš„é•¿åº¦ï¼Œå»æ‰é•¿åº¦å°äº36çš„reads HEADCROP:4 åˆ‡æ‰å¤´éƒ¨å¯¹åº”ç¢±åŸºæ•°å¹¶ä¸¢å¼ƒ
trimmomatic PE -phred33 ../FFR-6_read_1.fastq ../FFR-6_read_2.fastq FFR6_read_1_paired.fastq FFR6_read_1_unpaired.fastq FFR6_read_2_paired.fastq FFR6_read_2_unpaired.fastq ILLUMINACLIP:TruSeq3-PE.fa:2:30:10 LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:15 MINLEN:36 HEADCROP:4 1.2.2 Fastp # $fastp -i FFR-6_read_1.fastq -o FFR-6_clean_1.fastq -I FFR-6_read_2.fastq -O FFR-6_clean_2.fastq -e 20 -l 30 -n 0 -e, –average_qual if one read’s average quality score <avg_qual, then this read/pair is discarded. Default 0 means no requirement (int [=0]) -l, –length_required reads shorter than length_required will be discarded, default is 15. (int [=15]) –length_limit reads longer than length_limit will be discarded, default 0 means no limitation. (int [=0]) -n, –n_base_limit if one read’s number of N base is >n_base_limit, then this read/pair is discarded. Default is 5 (int [=5])
